administrative.name: Stackyard
administrative.description: The experiment started in 1938 on a site that had grown arable crops since at least 1876 and had 0.98% SOC in the topsoil.
administrative.management: Conventional management, ploughed. There is no irrigation.

soil.soilDescription: Sandy loam with 11-16% clay, Cambric Arenosol (FAO, 1990).

climate.name: temperate oceanic climate
climate.description: Sandy loam with 11-16% clay, Cambric Arenosol (FAO, 1990).
